name: esp32_idf5_https_server_compat
keywords: communication, esp32, http, https, server, ssl, tls, webserver, websockets
description: An Arduino library for an alternative ESP32 HTTP/HTTPS web server implementation. This library is a wrapper around esp32_https_server that provides the same API as the default Webserver library. Forked from fhessel/esp32_https_server_compat to allow compatibility with ESP-IDF 5.0
